storyName: Battle! Blazin' Soul of a Warrior!
storyInfo: The old hunter was repeatedly roughed up by the Rathalos until his will could no longer move his body. At this critical moment, a young figure draws the Rathalos's attention...

attributes.content: He kneeled on the ground, right hand still clutching the spear planted in the dirt.
His body was gravely injured, but he felt no pain, perhaps because it was pulsing from all directions and his aging nerves were too dulled feel it.

Or perhaps his skin was too scorched, to the point it could not comprehend the pain, the searing temperatures evaporating any kind of liquid or vapor, his blood instantly hardening to black scabs on his body.
His throat felt like it was on fire, with a strangely sweet scent emanating from it, and he suddenly felt a convulsion from his abdomen as something surged up.
Hggh—Aghk—
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Blech—bah! Kuso, this is so disgusting.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: A huge roar rumbled in his eardrums and his consciousness managed to peel away from the muddy chaos.
He raised his head, staring at the enormous behemoth rearing up before him.
He stared into its eyes.
Hoh...it's you.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yes... I remember now....
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Images from mere minutes ago flashed through his mind, and he seized the fleeting opportunity in-between the flames to hurl the spear towards the Rathalos's head.
He hit his target, but at the cost of failing to dodge the beast's retaliatory charge.
Hahah... hahahaha!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Blood! Haha, do you feel it? The pain?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: That was me! I made you bleed! How does it feel to be wounded?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I've known all along... those scales on your skull aren't so tough after all. I can spot your vulnerability at a glance!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You are not invincible... You can bleed, and you will fall!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Wait... Hey!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You! Where are you going?!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I just wounded you! You can't run away now!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I can still fight! We haven't battled it out yet!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: He leaned on his hunting spear, trying to prop up his body, but his knee would only stay at an angle.
The spear's shaft was sunk deep in the ground, and his shadow trembled violently.
You can't leave here! I won't... let you go...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I managed to make you bleed this time, so next...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I will plunge my spear into your heart!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: He raised the spear up high, and perhaps because he thought it was his final chance, his crooked body exploded with unimaginable strength.
He burst into a run, and once again charged at the life he could only look up to.
Aaaaaaaaahh—
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm... not dead yet...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Chikushou... one more time!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: His right hand was still holding the spear in a death grip, nails digging into his palm.
He hit his thighs in desperation, but the muscles merely trembled unresponsively.
This time, he had truly exhausted any last trace of strength in his body.
The spear slipped from his hand.
Get up! Stand up!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: ...Damn it!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Get! Up!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: His eyes widened.
He saw it.
A young child raising his bow and arrow, facing the Rathalos.
His thin arms trembled, but his gaze never wavered.
M-Monster...don't get any closer to Mr. Kashiwau!
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: I am Kazuya! I'm also a hunter of this village!
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: I won't let you destroy it! We will stop you here!
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: Corne!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm here!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I got him! The kid should be fine!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Scholar, go take the kid and Kashiwau somewhere safe!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mew got it!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Meow got the cart here!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: The Rathalos... is injured? By this hunter and a Terran spear?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: This hunter... his body is so light, where did he get all that strength from?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mister...
attributes.name: Kazuya

attributes.content: You're really a brave one, and I'd even call you a proper hunter, but how about we let the adults handle it today?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The flames blazed brilliantly.
At that very moment, another bruised body stood before the Rathalos.
She bent down and stretched out an arm, picking up the spear from the ground.
And then drove it firmly into the ground.
She straightened her back.
Thank you for your time, Kashiwau.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Now please, take a good rest on the sidelines.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: As for what comes next...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Leave it to us.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm ready!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Battle! Commeownce!
attributes.name: Palico
